intent_filters: <intent-filter xmlns:ns0="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"><action ns0:name="android.intent.action.SEND" /><action ns0:name="android.intent.action.SEND_MULTIPLE" /><category ns0:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /><data ns0:mimeType="image/bmp" /><data ns0:mimeType="image/jpeg" /><data ns0:mimeType="image/png" /><data ns0:mimeType="audio/*" /><data ns0:mimeType="video/*" /><data ns0:mimeType="application/*" /><data ns0:mimeType="text/csv" /><data ns0:mimeType="text/html" /><data ns0:mimeType="text/richtext" /><data ns0:mimeType="text/plain" /><data ns0:mimeType="text/x-vcard" /></intent-filter>
